data.name: Powerlust
data.detailed_description:
Old school action RPG roguelike with manual combat.


Powerlust is an old school action RPG roguelike with manual combat and a dark atmosphere.

Made by one guy


Hobby project made by one guy (me). I spent quite a few years on it already. No huge corporations involved :)

No rigid classes


You can create your own class, nothing is locked, feel free to play as a fire mage wielding a two handed sword or a necro archer.

Tons of masteries and skills


There is a vast number of options to choose from when it comes to spells, weapons, abilities and masteries. You can create a ton of builds and constantly find new ways of crushing your enemies!

Fun camera mods


Choose the way you play between Isometric, Top Down, TPP and FPP camera modes! Use fun camera filters to make the game look unique.

Still in development

This game is under ACTIVE DEVELOPMENT, I have many updates planned for it. I'd appreciate any feedback, it will be a really huge help in further development. Check out my twitter for constant updates and share your thoughts via email or discord!

Features:

  • skill based gameplay
  • hardcore permadeath mode for roguelike fans
  • procedurally generated dungeons
  • gamepad support

data.short_description: Powerlust is a solo indie action RPG with skill based gameplay. Travel through an open world, join different factions, design your own character class. Procedural generation and optional permadeath makes things even more interesting.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Czech, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU @ 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or Radeon HD 7750 with a minimum of 1GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU @ 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game is about killing monsters, so naturally there is a lot of violence and gore involved.
